SENT.plain: Burkitt lymphoma is a highly aggressive non-Hodgkin's lymphoma
As Burkitt lymphoma cells are very sensitive to chemotherapy, chemotherapy is the major therapeutic schedule for this disease
Rituximab raised the overall survival rate markedly
Bone marrow transplant, surgery and radiotherapy also demonstrated to have a supporting role for patients with Burkitt lymphoma
This review focus on research progress of the therapeutics and major regimens for the disease
